FWCToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FWCToken.sol#578-580) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,5000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FWCToken.sol#579)
